content: Who was the first human to walk on Earth?

As an AI language model, I don't have personal beliefs or the ability to determine the accuracy of historical events. However, according to anthropological research, the first humans to walk on Earth are believed to be the species Homo erectus, which emerged around 1.9 million years ago. They were followed by other Homo species, leading up to Homo sapiens, who appeared around 300,000 years ago.
